name: ZooSim
description: The humans have disappeared, and the animals are stuck in the Zoo! Rescue them in this adventure exploration comedy!

name: Lyonesse
description: Explore the magical island of Lyonesse. Lose yourself in a labyrinth of pleasure and beauty. A game inspired by Japanese Shunga and the Celtic legends of Lyonesse's Sunken Isles. Enter a hand-drawn vision of mythology, where nymphs frolic freely through a garden that bears the fruits of succulence.

name: Diphtheria
description: Sin descripción

name: Neon Knights: Humanity Erased
description: Sin descripción

name: Wronged Us
description: Face the twisted, living incarnations of a town's lost hope in this open-world survival horror game, inspired by Dark Souls and Silent Hill.

name: Sif and the Labyrinth
description: Sif and the Labyrinth is a pixel adventure game set in Norse mythology. Play as Sif, who embarks on a journey to uncover the reasons of disappearance of her husband Thor. Unleash Chakra Techniques and slash your way through the deserts and mountains where the darkest of entities exist.

name: LunaQuest
description: This is a medieval fantasy base game with enemies from the future trying to wipe out all of humanity. This is a Turned base JRPG with an Open world concept.

name: Time's Up in Tiny Town
description: Time's Up in Tiny Town is a fast-paced city-builder, in a pocket-sized world.

name: Punched
description: Your fists speak louder then your words! In this crazy F2P beat 'em up game use all the power you can get to absolutely obliterate the competition!

name: Road Diner Simulator
description: Buy an abandoned road diner and restore it to its full glory. Renovate, upgrade and expand the diner to offer more to your customers and attract new clientele.

name: Circuit: Laser Maze
description: Love logic puzzles? Challenge yourself with 55 levels of 3D connect-the-point style laser puzzles! Combining colors and angles for a truly retro gaming experience. Use your knowledge of the color wheel and keen skills of spatial perception for some passively educational fun!

name: Titanic: Fall of a Legend
description: Step aboard the RMS Titanic and experience the last moments of the most famous ocean liner to have ever been built. This unique experience provides you with the tragic events in extraordinary detail that caused the Titanic's demise.

name: Fractal Evolution
description: Fractal Evolution is a 2D space exploration RPG with life simulation elements inspired by Conway's Game of Life.

name: Quiet Farm
description: Join forces of a cow and a small alien and embark upon a fantastic adventure! Use the rich interactive environment to solve puzzles and fight your enemies. Be resourceful - not every cow gets a chance to save the world!

name: Color Slots
description: Color Slots is a speed puzzle runner. You help the rolling ball pass through the colored blocks.

name: Fallen Guns
description: Stand still and shoot in slow motion, walk and time returns to normal. Perfect shots and correct timings are what you're looking for in Fallen Guns.

name: Grim Road
description: Grim Road is a roguelike with turn-based combat set in a hopeless dark world. The Sun has disappeared, and heroes have to travel through dying lands to slay Archdemons and get a chance for humanity to survive. It's Gothic, it's Black&White, and has a lot of dithering.

name: Dreamlands: Cotton Candy Hunt
description: Avoid Spikes and cannons, run fast, jump precisely and collect enough candies to see all levels of Dreamlands. Once you have mastered the basics new challenges are waiting for you.

name: Temporal Sprint
description: Temporal Sprint is a 3D platformer game focused on Speedrunning and Time manipulation (such as slow motion and rewinding.)

name: Encore Illusions
description: Experience thrills, chills and spills in a war of wills. Blaze a winning trail through a magical game of hidden object adventure. The road to truth and justice isn't easy. Unlock card games as you progress through a maze of obstacles filled with hidden objects and puzzle challenges.

name: Human vs Food
description: Human vs Food is a challenging action platformer game set in a world where food has taken over the world. In battle, you will have to destroy food a lot and skillfully. Explore 100 levels, play as 6 different characters with different skills. Save the world!

name: Wasteland Warden
description: You take it upon yourself to clean up the wasteland by imprisoning all sorts of robots and cyborgs in this near future dystopia. Build and level a team of prisoners in this party-based RPG with tactical combat as you face off against crime lords, artificial intelligence and an all consuming sludge.

name: Ethos 2: Fall of Empires
description: Constantinople has fallen to the Ottomans. As the last Emperor or the Byzantines, it is your job to take it back. Explore the open world, and carve your own path to overthrow the Ottoman's. Every choice you make matters. Become a Tyrant, a Hero, a Lone Wolf, or much more! The choice is yours!

name: Spooky Horror Game
description: A psychedelic horror shooter. A prison, four monsters, and you. Collect items and keys to survive. Don't let them find you.

name: Vampire Combat
description: Test your skills in the Art of VAMPIRE COMBAT. Become one of 6 dynamic, elegant, Vampires of Fullerton: Ashzel, Casandra, Larson, Johfra, Colmillo, and LeonaLisa. Rendezvous with a worthy Vampire opponent acclimated in all disciplines. Showcase your VAMPIRE COMBAT skills.

name: Knightlife
description: Four villages in a war. You are the only hope for a peaceful life. Play as a knight in this cute open world RPG and loot through many different weapons, magical spells and bows. Become the strongest knight and end this war.

name: Pop's
description: Save the toys!

name: Color Flash
description: Color Flash is an endless runner 2d game based on colors. The player has to pass through a series of obstable bars (divided into four tiles) by matching the tile with the same color as the player.

name: Zombie Crush VR
description: Woke up on the street alone in the middle of Zombie apocalypse and faced an awful decaying undead hunting you down straight away - What could be more fun? Only start crashing them into pieces with no mercy with different kinds of tools to save your life. Grab your weapon and let’s Crush Zombie VR!

name: Dream Kitchen
description: Follow the story from different points of view and make choices to decide your future on five different routes and discover the mystery behind this magical adventure as you find love with one of the appliances of your kitchen.

name: City Night Carnage
description: City Night Carnage is a first-person survival horror in the setting of a night city. Find weapons and ammunition, first-aid kits and records that reveals what is happening here. But most important is to find a key somewhere nearby that will help you avoid a deadly encounter with HIM!

name: Kubberz
description: Kubberz is an Action RPG where you can take part on epic battles against your friends and other players around the world, as well as collect and train more then 100 different species of Kubberz.

name: Super Liquid Soccer
description: Super Liquid Soccer is a fun arcade style 7 aside soccer/real football game coming soon for PC and Mac. A game for those less worried about simulating every blade of grass and more about epic battles amongst friends, last minute winners, cynical fouls, bullet headers and questionable tactics.

name: Witch Slide
description: Witch Slide is a free to play, co-operative (1-4 players), sliding and dodging game where you leave your village with great haste to find what has corrupted the nearby forest. Together with your friends you must find your way through puzzles and escape danger.

name: Keep Light
description: Bruno is looking for those who left him. He wants know the reason. Will he bring the Light to them or no?

name: Herency
description: Herency is a cooperative survival game for 1-4 players. Grandma died and something happened at the family meal, run away from the killer and find a way to escape and take the inheritance with you.

name: My Otaku Academia
description: A Fan made game of 9 Anitube all stars and a mystery girl. Play as Nux Taku as his first day in a new school begins! Make friends, enemies, and fall in love!

name: Grappling Hook Ball Tournament
description: Grappling Hook Ball Tournament is a shooting game, players against players. Play with friends, up to 8 players. Welcome to the arena!

name: Bobalicous
description: A Juicy Treasure Hunting Game. Search for the Gem Chest. Search for the Key. Unlock the Gem Chest with the Key. Bring the Gem back to the Gem site.

name: Solitaire Harmony
description: Minimalist solitaire peg puzzles, find your way out to the last dragon in this relaxing and beautiful game.

name: Handyman Corporation
description: In Handyman Corporation you become the owner of a business where you handle a variety of jobs in cleaning, maintenance, design, and construction. Accept contracts, play minigames to perform every task required. Then expand your company – buy spare parts, tools, train skills, and manage.

name: My Last Journey
description: We all fall once...And now that day has come,when we were down,too.You have to go on an unforgettable adventure,which change you forever.Your fate depends on your decisions, will be you able to survive,or this journey will be your last...

name: Wingsuit Dream
description: One day, you have dreamt about fly the sky in there you feel free to fly A simple game about scoring, avoid and fly!

name: Bear Adventures 2
description: Bear Adventures is a 3D platformer with exciting levels in different locations and unique graphics! You can play alone, as well as invite your friends, because Bear Adventures is co-op game mode supports up to 4 players!

name: Call For Backup
description: Defend USA in a post-apocalyptic war against ghouls and commies. While some are in control of combat drones, one person becomes the commander. Ground forces rely on the commander's air support, but he can’t see the battlefield. Communication is crucial! Single-player campaign included!

name: A Frustrating Platformer
description: Test your platforming skills in this challenging 2D platformer game

name: Watermelon Wars
description: A game based on a popular Chinese video. A war caused by buying a watermelon.

name: Toolnich Village
description: Toolnich Village, a Retro, 2D level-based game similar to an RPG. The game has a story where you "PLAYER" try to save or not the Toolnich location.

name: See You In Desolation?
description: "See You In Desolation?" is a psychological, single-player, first-person horror game. You have to take on the role of Adam - an introverted young man who prefers to be at home all days.

name: Lotto Life
description: A dystopian lottery simulator. Set in a city ruled by a mega-corporation, try to stay afloat in a world with mandatory consumerism quotas. Will the lottery offer reprieve? Will lady luck favor you?

name: Maybe Immortal
description: Maybe Immortal is an action role-playing hack-and-slash game based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow in a courtyard of one mysterious taoist to become immortal.

name: KeyHero
description: KeyHero is a puzzle game. In the game, the key is the only tool for you to pass obstacles.

name: Starblast: Retro Wars
description: A simple colorful arcade twin-stick shooter in space.

name: Mizu
description: A casual rollerblading game. From the hills to the city, Mizu is the rollerblading game you've always wanted. Bomb hills, grind handrails, jump unbelievable gaps and explore the city on inline skates! 8 grinds and 4 grabs to choose from!

name: The Circle of Suffering
description: This game is a psychological horror in which the main character wakes up in an unfamiliar house and must pass all the levels by solving puzzles.

name: Inner Light
description: Meditation beyond a simple relaxation - actively using the power of VR to bring meditator into deeper levels of relaxation, awareness and focus.

name: Stolen Crown
description: Stolen Crown is a deck-building game with dynamic combat, diverse encounters, and powerful relics. Three different classes, paired with hundreds of spells and abilities, means each run has something to offer!

name: Mystery of Island
description: Mystery of Island is a wilderness survival game. Various enemies, huge map to explore, collect resources to improve and strengthen yourself over time.

name: The Dormant Knight
description: Fight your way through hordes of skeletons and spirits, in The Dormant Knight! A 2D Halloween Hack and Slash, Adventure. Explore the mysterious land of Dreadborough, a once lavish land now tainted by evil spirits due to the Dormant Knight's re-wakening! Why has the Dormant Knight awoken once more?

name: Cursed Quest
description: An action adventure game where you will explore, fight, solve puzzles, improve your abilities and find equipment to make your way to the "source".

name: Atomic Souls
description: Atomic Souls is a tactical roguelite deckbuilder which has you playing as an awoken remnant of the old world. Journey through the new world, encounter bizarre creatures, assemble the perfect deck, discover powerful artifacts, and fulfill your destiny!

name: There is No Stairs
description: Thousands of rocket jump accidents are reported worldwide every year. Unfortunately, a bald inventor here also lost legs trying to get up to the second floor. But he wasn't frustrated. Now he is designing an unprecedented new invention, dreaming of a world without rocket jumps... It's the stairs.

name: Shrumblo and the Magical Grumblo
description: Survive for as long as you can while playing as the blue robot Shrumblo! The objective of this game is to lure Grumblo, the red demon, into several moving spikes which temporarily stuns him, and also earns you a point. Survive for as long as you can and earn a high score!

name: Zombie Maze
description: If you love top-down shooters and mazes of which it is incredibly difficult to find a way out, then Zombie Maze will be a real godsend for you! Go through the most difficult maze from start to finish, along the way, shooting back from the bloodthirsty hordes of zombies! Don't let them get in the way

name: Palmi: Retold Tale
description: Defeat evil sorcerer and save the world in this platform adventure game. Discover seven different hand-painted lands and follow the story full of amazing events and meets.

name: Mini Army Tactics Medieval
description: Casual turn-based strategy game set in a fantasy Medieval era. Strategically command your troops on the battlefield to crush your opponent in combat. Use your troops abilities carefully to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Do you have what it takes to win the war?

name: X Fugitive
description: X Fugitive is a police chase game where player have to run from the police cars . This is an endless game in which you just have to survive as long as possible.

name: Monastery Builder
description: Become a monk in a medieval European monastery. Be diligent with your duties, and develop and expand your friary. Learn plenty of useful skills and contribute to raising the standard of living for the local community.

name: Dash Cup Kickers
description: Super fast paced arcade action soccer with incredible power dashes, sweet mega tricks and unbelieveable powerful super shots! Master all tricks, skill up your team, develop the best technique and earn gold in all cups! Play online or locally with up to 4 players in varying stadiums

name: Hordebreaker
description: An army of monsters, demons, and undead sweeps the land. Armed with only an old sword, crossbow, and A LOT of fireworks, waves of unique and dangerous enemies advance on you. Upgrade your equipment, and push back. Take the fight to them, destroy their leaders, and break the horde.

name: Unread Unwound
description: There’s one goal: SAVE THE WORLD. Unread Unwound is a warm RPG where a strange power connects you to a mysterious guide. Battle enemies, explore a colorful journey, and perhaps appease your inner demons.

name: True Magician
description: How do you become a true magician? Find out in True Magician, an interactive text adventure with RPG elements. Travel through the kingdom with your teacher, learn the art of magic, fight enemies and make friends. And remember, the world is not what it seems!

name: Evil Dreams
description: Evil Dreams is a dark adventure about nightmares, telling the story of a boy living in the late 19th century and forced to face ancient evil. Delve into the world of dreams to find out the truth.

name: Inari's Tale
description: A 2D action-puzzle-platformer mixing traditional animation, strong story-telling, and evolutive gameplay.

name: Space Balls
description: Shoot yourself into space as high as you can in this arcade game with a retro soundtrack!

name: Danglebox
description: Danglebox is about creating physics based structures to hunt for resources or just for fun. Build with various materials, lift with balloons, pull with ropes and push with thrusters to enable your designs to withstand the weight of trains, buildings, containers, weapons fire and more.

name: Lupa
description: A beautiful stylized polygon 3rd-person exploration game, with a semi-open world and a beautiful She-Wolf, called Lupa who is looking for her missing pack and her two little cubs. With a story inspired by Roman mythology. Join Lupa in this beautiful world and her journey!

name: Exodus: Trapped In Time
description: A retro 2.5D sci-fi FPS shooter with modern mechanics with custom engine. Features completely destructible environments, bullet-time slow motion, Newtonian physics, dynamic lighting and more fun features.

name: Project Runner
description: Project Runner is a Survival Game where the protagonist is trapped in a maze with the main objective is to scape the maze.

name: Take As Needed
description: Assume a lead drug development role at Mazer- the foremost pharmaceutical company in the world! Create groundbreaking drugs for your customers, work hard to impress your bosses, and try not to ruffle too many feathers...

name: Isaiah 188
description: Fight on the ground and in space around 17 different bodies in our solar system with unique lite orbital mechanics. Recruit armies, build fleets, and conquer the solar system as one of three unique factions in this turn based strategy game!

name: Fallen Flowers
description: Strange atmosphere, strange things, but the performance is so "familiar". How "strange" does the familiar room and familiar her look? Why does everything start? Where will it go?

name: Salvation: Shadows of the Faceless
description: A first-person dark horror game essentially tells about mental suffering, overcoming fears, and the power of true love.

name: Three Defilements
description: Three Defilements is a hack and slash adventure game about a young woman who keeps waking up in the same place every day. She travels to find a way out of this cycle, passing through various strange places. and must battle her most vexing foe, her own defilements.

name: Mystery Chamber 2015 Forever
description: The final and expanded edition of Mystery Chamber 2015, which includes various improvements, gameplay changes, and new content.

name: Unfair Souls: Darkest Grind
description: A 2D Souls-Like Pixel Art Platformer.

name: Battle Bees Royale
description: ~ BATTLE ROYALE WITH A FUN BEE POWERED TWIST ~Fight for survival in a top down, last blimp standing multiplayer Battle Royale!

name: Cartels
description: Cartels is a tactical hardcore multiplayer first person shooter taking place in 1980s Colombia. Experience a variety of intense objective focused versus and cooperative game modes where a single bullet is often enough to win the fight.

name: Boomerang Woman
description: This is an orthodox horizontal scrolling 2D action game 'Platformer'. A player will control 'Kyoko Senbonbashi', who always stands on the side of justice, to defeat an evil organization 'Dokuro-dan' by using a boomerang thrown to 8 directions and passing all 8 stages.

name: A Contusion
description: A Contusion is a slow-paced slightly realistic roguelite top-down shooter where you find yourself lost and with impaired memory. Weapons and armor, shields, grenades and first aid kits, powerful artifacts and perks will help you on a difficult road to the past.

name: Knight Jones and Dragons Fall
description: Protect innocent people from evil dragons as the most noble and humble of all knights. Uncover the treacherous deception and save the Kingdom (optionally you can marry the prince/princess afterwards).

name: The Medieval Psychologist
description: You are a stranger in Lostworth, full of people lost in the darkness of the Middle Ages. Your purpose; helping people spiritually. For this, you only have books, potions, spells and your words. In this adventure, you will face the truth about yourself as you uncover the secrets of the city.

name: Blood Red Fists
description: Explore a vast and crime ridden city, fight your enemies in first person mode, talk to random strangers, steal and sell various items, gamble with your money, gain experience and spend it on helpful skills. But above all, try to stay alive in this 2d retro beat 'em up.

name: Lendas
description: Lendas is an action RPG with focus on exploration and survival in a living ecosystem procedurally generated. You will harvest resources, defeat powerfull creatures and borrow their powers to defeat the Corpo-seco and the mighty Cuca.

name: Runeforge
description: Design your own spells, weapons, armor and tools. Discover procedurally generated mobs, resources, and regions. Build anything, anywhere. Team up with friends & play together in the ultimate sandbox RPG!

name: Jigsaw Souls
description: A fun puzzle about Daltoniel, the protagonist from the Souls Saga by Pickles Entertainment. Relax resolving this jigsaw puzzle with 12 original pictures and 3 difficulty levels!

name: Sludge Fighters
description: Fight from the floor, wall, or ceiling! In Sludge Fighters, gravity follows you. Turn into a ball of sludge to launch onto a new surface or sneak under arena obstacles! Run, punch, and kick to knock out other players. In this online multiplayer arena, join your friends or host a public game.

name: Captain Diarrhea and the Shartening
description: A top-down action shooter/sprayer. Use gross and weird movement mechanics and abilities. Enact revenge on the black military division that abducted you and made you the way that you are. BRING FORTH THE SHARTENING.

name: Pump King
description: Wield the incredible power of the shot-leg to blast your way out of an unforgiving and seemingly endless chasm. Or screw up and send yourself tumbling back down to the bottom - it’s up to you.

name: Kehra
description: Kehra is a future based little puzzel game, with different voicelines and music...

name: Elusive World
description: Survive against wild animals, common bandits, and overpowering rulers. Collect ingredients to craft from simple arrows for your bow to complex Ice Sword. Rich coming-of-age adventure. Single-player, story-driven RPG.

name: Fall of an Empire
description: Defend your realm from invaders in Fall of an Empire. Barbarians attack your frontiers and treacherous vassals plot against you. You know your crumbling empire won't last forever, but it's up to you to see how long you can save it.

name: Wekufu
description: A Dark, Hand Drawn 2D Hack and Slash Platformer. Play as Sakinko, a young warrior set on a quest to avenge her father’s death and protect her people from the evil spirits that now menace her land, these evil spirits take the name of Wekufu.

name: Nano Racing
description: Race around a number of tracks in miniature cars all with ultra realistic next gen graphics. Choose between a number of cars, each with its own driving style. Participate in single player events or race against others online

name: Dangerous Drift
description: Dangerous Drift is an arcade racing game, in which we must manage to beat our rivals by driving in different locations around the world. Will you be able to win all the challenges?

name: Dumb Bomb Game
description: Bing bang boom, explode your guy across the room! Use bombs to guide your guy to the portal at the end of each level. Avoid the danger that sits between you and a high score!

name: Roma Invicta
description: Roma Invicta combines action packed real-time battles with turn-based strategy on a big campaign map. Supply your legions and conquer ancient Gaul turn by turn. Fight by yourself or hand over your soldiers to the AI ​​and enjoy the spectacle.

name: Evasilix
description: Evasilix is a 2.5D die and retry platformer combined with a unique movement mechanic. Challenge yourself in more than 25 hand-crafted levels, each filled with deadly traps, countless obstacles, strong enemies, and reveal the disturbing truth that lies behind Evasilix!

name: Warden of the Arcaen
description: Warden of the Arcaen is a dating sim style visual novel. The player will get to choose between dating men or women at the beginning of the game, play as 'Friends to Lovers' OR 'Enemies to Lovers'. Immerse yourself in this modern fantasy world and explore magical relationships!

name: One by One
description: Human phobias have awoken in this dark roguelike shooter One by One! Collect powerful artifacts and descend into random dungeons full of monsters and huge boss fights. Use your soul — an ultimate weapon that uncovers enemy weaknesses.

name: Mythic Legions Tactics
description: Discover the world of Mythoss and build your "Mythic Legion" in this innovative, customizable, non-Pay-to-win tactics game featuring Fully 3D Realistic Environments, Hundreds of Class options, and Skill Based Battles! Build your Legion! Change your faction! Fight in the war of the aetherblade!

name: Darwin's Aquarium
description: Breeding and training intelligent fishes is your hobby. Discover new species and defeat the bossfish - make your fish become real animals - wiht a real brain... brwwww. Learn AI the easy way - like playing.

name: Roady Life
description: Experience the life of a trucker, delivering cargo between various industries. Feed the most valuable production lines or fulfill contracts to earn enough money to own the largest fleet of trucks among your friends, or start your own industries to maximize your profits.

name: The Pied Piper of Gamelin
description: Casual third person game. In fact, this is a remake of "Snake", but thanks to the 3D graphics it has a peculiar gameplay. The camera position can be easily adjusted at will. Character control is very simple, you can also use a gamepad.

name: Finding Home
description: A zombie shooter where you can build your base and craft items to help you survive.

name: Catoise
description: Make portals and levitate objects to solve puzzles - help Catoise get back home after a shopping trip in space ends in a crash landing. Collect parts of the damaged ship scattered across this strange planet. Meet friendly and unfriendly animal characters along the way.

name: The 8 Sins: New Hell Order
description: Turn-based horror strategy game with RPG elements where the action takes place in hell, player take lead one of 8 demonic races that each of them represents one of 7 Deadly Sins (the 8th sin is Acedia).

name: Alpha Zoo
description: A cozy typing game for parents to play with their young children. Build a zoo, ride the rides, eat and shop, explore and play together!

name: Blade and Ham
description: Blade and Ham is a classic fantasy beat'em up with modern picture! Grab your sword sharpen blade and don't forget a ham.

name: Magna Graecia
description: Magna Graecia is a colorful building strategy and puzzle game in ancient Greek style in which you create a sprawling village with olives and grapes by placing buildings strategically, leveling them up, receiving adjacency bonuses, and expanding your territory, while enjoying the whole process.

name: Heatris
description: For those who want to play a puzzle with time where it will require patience, you can choose the image and the level of difficulty.

name: Cult of Mine
description: Do you want to become the leader of a cult? Do you want to cause nightmares, take control of others' dreams and contact the dead? Welcome to "Cult of Mine" that unites occultism, rabbits, and satire!

name: Undead Pixel Monks
description: Fight dangerous and terrifying enemies, explore a dreamlike world, interact with its strange inhabitants, and uncover the truth. Undead Pixel Monks Adventure is a 2D action-adventure game set in a fantasy world inspired by Japanese mythology and philosophy.

name: Kitsune Battlemage
description: Kitsune Battlemage is an intense elemental magic combat game where you're not limited to any specific school or style. Choose your abilities, wage battle against your fellow battlemages, and train your skills in order to fight the growing darkness that approaches!

name: Dark Colors
description: Dark Colors is a psychological horror adventure set within an abandoned research facility. You follow your character as you find out what exactly happened here years prior, tasked with gathering information, you start to suspect that you may not be alone in this facility...

name: Stretchy-Man: The Video Game
description: Stretchy-Man is a physics based puzzle game. Earths mightiest super hero Super-Duper-Man has been captured by the villain Evil-Man, leaving it up to the unlikely hero Stretchy-Man to save the world from destruction. Will you be able to stop Evil-Man before its too late?

name: Monster Tamer
description: Catch, raise, and fight monsters in a fantasy world! Fuse monsters with simple drag and drop to evolve them into powerful monsters in no time! Raise your own unique monsters to your liking, and fight and capture the toughest enemies that stand in your way! Will you be the best monster tamer?

name: Captain Jackson
description: Dynamic 2D retro, pixel-art, shooter. Fly fast, shoot accurately. Fight back the Rivanirs invasion. You are the Captain Jackson, you are their Doom.

name: Dragluttony
description: Dear fellow wizard, get ready to enter our frantic 4-player arena party game! With your powerful (but random) spells and potions, feed your little cute Draglutton to make it so big it devours all your friends in a colorful and quirky chaos (without any dragon body shaming here)!

name: Tetromino X
description: Tetromino X is a collection of falling block action puzzle games each with their own unique spin. Relax and drop blocks at your own pace in Chill. Balance and stabilize a stack of blocks as it grows ever higher in Stack. Match blocks together to upgrade upcoming blocks in Match.

name: Enigmarella
description: Happy birthday Alice Rahner! You will be forced into an arranged marriage. Of course, falling in love with your new husband is entirely up to you. With 16 truly unique endings, are you willing to follow your heart?

name: Alien Prop Hunt
description: Jump into an exciting new take on a classic concept! Alien Prop Hunt is an action packed team-based game where one team desperately tries to hide in plain sight, while the other relentlessly searches through environments to find them!

name: Brinefall
description: Gather resources to build your own home and village. Explore a vast open-world to find all its secrets and explore its mysteries. Defeat enemies and gather loot in a game that combines sandbox and RPG.

name: Blackholes Stars
description: A click-based physics game.

name: Serendipity Hotel
description: The detective is invited to the Serendipity Hotel. What will the detective experience in the hotel? Become a detective and participate in the Serendipity Hotel event

name: Cannon Canines
description: Cannon Canines is a 3D, mini-tank driving, action-adventure game! Play as a Cannon Canine, and join a crew of freedom-fighting animals in the Pawpad Isles in order to free your friends from a tyrannical megacorporation!

name: Mathomatics
description: Runner puzzle on reaction speed and ability in mathematics. You control a cube that moves towards math blocks.

name: Signum Perfectum
description: Collectible card game where opponents fight in turns casting magic upon each other.

name: Kupechestvo
description: Kupechestvo is a board game with historical elements.

name: Blade Crusade
description: Put your platforming and fighting skills to the test in Blade Crusade, where each of the 200+ levels may take you seconds or hours to beat! Use your growing arsenal of moves to slice through enemies and dash through levels at breakneck speed.

name: Soccer Boss
description: Be the Boss of your own soccer club, choosing from clubs from the biggest leagues across Europe. Make decisions based on tactics, training, staff recruitment and player selection. Spend your transfer budget wisely during the transfer window whilst keeping the board satisfied with your performance.

name: The Divide
description: "The Divide" Is a tactical turn-based strategy game, with deckbuilding elements, set in a divided land, fight for your king, and unite the kingdom!

name: Pixel Skater
description: Pixel Skater is a fast-paced arcade skateboarding game with precise controls, a deep combo system, and an extraordinarily detailed level editor. Play, build, and compete online with your friends. Not a social butterfly? Enjoy an immersive story mode, challenges, and even puzzles!

name: Gravity Flip
description: Gravity Flip is a Single-Player, 2D platforming game. Throughout the game, the player must utilize the ability to switch the pull of gravity to maneuver around obstacles as they explore deeper.

name: Cellings
description: Cellings is a creative sandbox game taking place in an abstract procedural world full of various species. Experience the full evolution of cells across 3 generations, compete with other species, and explore breathtaking worlds.

name: Zoms & Guns
description: Zoms & Guns takes place in a picturesque town brimming with museums, multi-coloured houses, enticing boutiques and cozy cafés. The town is home to very warm and friendly people. Life takes a turn on a cold winter night, suddenly an evil darkness takes over the neighbourhood.

name: Alien Shepherd
description: Alien Shepherd is a platformer with a flying mechanic that can be activated by fusioning with a pet Jellyfish.

name: Little Red Rocket Ship
description: Little Red Rocket Ship is a bullet hell game with shoot-'em-up and platforming sections, featuring challenging but short levels and multiple weapon and ship options.

name: Battle Fishing Masters
description: Battle Fishing Masters combines a fishing RPG and shooter with rogue-lite elements. Catch, battle and collect over 150 unique robot fish. Upgrade new weapons and gear. Meet a cast of exotic characters with quests, and challenge the fishing bosses on your way to becoming the champion!

name: Sky DarkCrow
description: Crow has to defeat enemies and collect coins and others.

name: Hive Defender
description: Classic RTS and Tower Defense elements combine inside of a procedurally generated and fully destructible labyrinth. Control multiple alien swarms simultaneously, unlock and activate special abilities, and team up with friends online to beat back waves of human invaders!

name: The Misty Tale
description: The Misty Tale is a third-person fantasy-fighting game where you have to swim on a raft, navigate the terrain on the map, find and remove magical runes, and fight their defenders, to fulfill the request of your savior

name: Doggo
description: Follow Doggo on his quest to find his Human so he can finally go back to sleep.

name: Save the Llama
description: Craft the perfect defense upon shifting platforms, turning gears, and railways to defend your cows from alien UFO's in this space western tower defense.

name: Shadow Cave
description: Shadow Cave - Uncover the secrets of the shadow cave in this platformer game with its protagonist. Explore the dark sections of dangerous nooks and crannies, collect coins and watch out for ghosts!

name: No Rage Quit Dude
description: a game where only luck counts, jumping from platform to platform. Just mystery and luck will be essential for this game. Maybe you can finish maybe you can not. I just know the assets but I don't know what will you see and what gonna happen.

name: Panacle: Back to Wild
description: A CCG integrating warchess, roguelike, deck building with a world outlook of the post civilization era

name: Zombie Vegas
description: Meet a zombie apocalypse in the most not boring place on earth - Las Vegas? Why not! Zombie Vegas is an intense arcade action game with the strange red button and the hero protecting it. Buy weapons and bonuses, barricade ways and destroy the approaching zombie.

name: Moadra
description: Endure... Evolve... Or Die. Embrace the unknown and traverse a vast alien world riddled with bizarre creatures, deadly hazards, and grim mysteries. Seek redemption, and confront the terrifying sin buried in the depths of the forgotten planet Protea VI.

name: Gods of Hellas VR
description: Save your residents and keep their islands from sinking.

name: Splodge Royale
description: Use Gyro Aim to Paint and Power Slide your way around while defeating Monsters, building platforms and avoiding the deadly Squog (Square Fog). Single Player and up to 4 Local Players for Co-op and Versus. From the maker of Zombie Death Quota.

name: The Infecting 3
description: Fight zombies, customise your character or your ride and try to survive! In The Infecting 3 the characters have crash landed on a mysterious island, and must find the truth behind this horrific apocalypse.

name: Revenants: Spirit & Mind
description: Revenants is single-player VR Action/ Horror. Become a professional occult investigator, relying on cutting edge technology from 2030 to locate, trap and battle demonic forces, all whilst gathering evidence and solving the mystery of the occult crimes.

name: Running Challenge
description: Race with other AI players, achieve levels

name: Plunger Boyz
description: Plunger Boyz is an entertaining platformer in which you have to reach the end of Chaos and reclaim your crown using the plunger to pull in and out of objects, as well as going through some challenges and solving puzzles.

name: Titan78
description: This is survival game for one player and for cooperation in 4 players.

name: In the Wild
description: Take control of your favorite animal and learn interesting facts while exploring various beautiful environments. Complete tasks, play mini-games, and watch the animal AI explore with you in this educational single-player simulation game.

name: Alchemical Inc.
description: Card battle your rivals turn by turn. Explore the mean steampunk streets of New Folk City. Trade your cards to craft the perfect deck or else you're going home empty handed.

name: The Soul Box
description: The Soul Box is a kinetic visual novel about the mystery of a puzzle box. A story of an inheritance hidden behind what’s written. A different look at the future, a worried glance at the past.

name: Galactic Frontier
description: Galactic Frontier is a story focused Sci-Fi explorative twin stick shooter. Embark on an intergalactic adventure in the chaotic and war torn expanse of what was the Milky Way. Fight alongside rebels or repress them! Become a pirate or submit to the Machine Plague, choose your own destiny.

name: Santa Protects the Christmas Tree
description: Snowmen are stealing the Christmas presents! Santa Claus must protect the gifts! Tell him where to move while he shoot snowballs against the Snowmen! Pickup blinking Presents to acquire new Snowball-Launchers or activate an effect.

name: Cryptonaut
description: Cryptonaut: A retro-inspired crypto-themed first-person shoot 'em up! Blast and evade. Collect and score. The easiest way to make millions in crypto!

name: A Distant Stabbing
description: A game designed to upset you. Master bouncing your arrows to see how high you can climb. Ideal for alt-tab gaming while you wait for your next match to start!

name: Tanasurga
description: Tanasurga is an Narrative driven RPG where you play as mecha mercenaries in alternate WW2 setting. Build your own mecha, recruit and lead a team of pilots with different characteristics and skills. Gain riches and determine how the war unfolds between 3 main factions.

name: Rated Mutant
description: Slash and Blast through a subterranean laboratory to rescue your father from the evil 'V'. Explore treacherous paths, gruesome monsters and uncover secrets all while mastering unique weapons, in this action packed, death defying Metroidvania.

name: No Tyrant
description: A FPS shooting hero counter dictator game.

name: Sorcerer's Tournament
description: This turn-based RPG is about growing and improving new characters with mini-games between each battle as you permanently unlock new spells, modes and difficulties. Pick the way your student fights, and develop them to reach the number one spot!

name: You Better Run
description: You Better Run is a fun party online multiplayer indie game for (2-4) players.

name: The Last Rite of Death
description: You will have to get used to the role of the main character James, with whom you will learn the terrible story of his Walker family, solve riddles, get to the truth and find out what really happened in this cursed house.

name: Sharp Wands
description: Fight your friends in an action packed 2D experience, learn to use the forest at your advantage and collect useful powerups to show off your style! Learn to fight with different characters each with its unique powers and flaws

name: Witchbane
description: Witchbane is a retro-styled 2D action platformer where you must use your skills and weapons to defeat the evil brought unto the world by witches. Work your way through each distinct level and defeat the witch who controls the horde of monsters in that area to end the blight placed upon the land.

name: Talespinner
description: Talespinner is a deck-building roguelite game that takes place in an exotic and bizarre world of Japanese mythology. Players take the role of a mysterious storyteller visited by various mythological gods and demons who only have one wish - to experience an incredible story.

name: Helium Electric
description: The year is 1986 and you just got a job at the Helium Electric corporation.Your adventure begins on the Moon, where you manage a helium harvesting station.You are alone and your family is counting on you.

name: Lord of the Rings: Warrior of Middle Earth
description: Turn your TV into the epic battlefield in Middle-Earth! Wield the wireless sword to shield yourself and defeat your enemies. The sword actually interacts with your TV screen! Just plug the castle turret into your TV or VCR, and you're ready to fight Orc Archers, the Cave Troll, Gollum, Saruman, and more. You'll team up with your favorite characters such as Aragorn, Gandalf, Frodo, Legolas, and others. This interactive plug and play game brings the fantastic land of Middle-Earth, and the epic battles and adventures from The Lord of the Rings, right into your living room! Lord of the Rings: Warrior of Middle Earth comes with a castle turret, wireless sword, and complete gameplay instructions.

name: MoonFall: Butterfly Lovers
description: 2021 Galgame popular works The story is based on Chinese legends Before the moon fell, Spending time with beautiful girl Kaori. Whether to live in a dreamlike utopia, Or face the harsh reality. Love, self, future, all in the world of Moonfall

name: Heka
description: Heka is a Mystery and Exploration based game set in the early roaring twenties. Venture to the Giza Necropolis to be the first eager Egyptologist to uncover an ancient tomb holding the secrets of the last native Pharoah!

name: Debug
description: Solving a puzzle made up of trauma of the commissioning robot, inferring the doctor's evaporated memory with the pieces he found, Take advantage of jumping, wall climbing, and running to challenge the adventure of breaking through obstacles.

name: Artisan
description: A young man finds himself trapped in an otherworldly museum where he is forced to fight in a battle royal using strange ghost-like creatures called Artisans.

name: Gettysburg: Fields of Valor
description: An advanced historical war game that simulates the pivotal three-day battle at Gettysburg during the American Civil War. The game models every brigade, battery, and leader who participated in the largest battle ever fought on the North American continent.

name: Deadly Nightmare
description: Deadly Nightmare is an exciting and engaging Horror/Survival game where you play the role of a boy living in a big manor. You need to use all the tools at your disposal in order to explore the world, find mysteries and explore a variety of challenging, scary and supernatural locations.

name: Abandoned Archive
description: Abandoned Archive is a fantasy, spell-casting, rogue-like, featuring a wide variety of relics, a unique spell-upgrading system, with compelling and engaging bosses. Each floor is filled with items and mysteries for the player to uncover; what will you discover in the Abandoned Archive?

name: Skeeter's Grid
description: Re-connect mixed-up circuits in this 80s-inspired isometric puzzler as you move from board to board, each of increasing complexity and variation. Collect components, remnants of former grid guardians, as you rebuild each system, with the chance of additional components spawning during replays.

name: Lucky Fish Bread
description: Let the world know the fish bread! Wake up the fish bread fairies to learn a variety of menus, satisfy the customers, and protect the store from the villains!

name: Crowd Sign: Emission
description: Crowd Sign: Emission is a game where you paint a signs and watch the action unfold then later you can explore the world of the game in first person mode. Fantastic quest story with a branched out plot. The scenario is randomly generated each time, and the lore is created by the player himself.

name: Awakened Evil
description: Awakened Evil is an action platformer inspired by the classics. Jump and slash your way through intense linear stages that will put your skills to the test. Do you have what it takes to slay all the bosses, and take on evil itself?

name: Run Ninja Run
description: Become a Ninja and run, throw shurikens, jump, slide and kill to get trought the end of the game.

name: It Takes Two Girls
description: Who would refuse the request of two beautiful girls to travel together~

name: Ink and Paper: Wandering
description: Fight enemies with four different styles in turn-based tactical combat. Grant mercy to your enemies and maybe they'll spare you. Flee when you can't win, and return with friends. Avoid spiritual foes, who can't be defeated in battle. Step in the world of the well known, but still different fantasy.

name: Light Paradox
description: Light Paradox is an J-RPG/Survival 2D pixelart game. The story behind the creation of the universe, the information control and the individual character storyline mix all together into this complex world.

name: Bluewater: Private Military Operations VR
description: Welcome to experience this "BlueWater VR", which is a military theme VR game. Its ultra-high graphic quality brought with 38GB data would be shocking.

name: Plum Bun Reformatted
description: Reformatted to 200 custom handmade pages, this Harlem Renaissance story confronts the reader with questions about personas people wear with challenging themes of race, gender, and capitalism. When two sisters Angela and Virginia are prompted by society, this difficult story explores their choices.

name: The Final Hour
description: The Final Hour is a captivating first person horror game with its very own story. Can you solve the mystery of the mysterious house? Has your final hour come? Find out now in "The Final Hour."

name: Asteroid Arena
description: A player vs player, last man standing, space ship arena battle.

name: Mystic Cards
description: This Game is a card oracle simulator.It's a game that could change the way you consult an oracle.

name: Trapped in the Forest
description: You awake in a mysterious forest that seems strangely familiar. Have you been here before? Is this a dream or a nightmare?

name: Battle Barn: Tactics
description: Recruit animals with abilities to fight bite-sized tactical battles...And why not take down an interdimensional space clown while you're at it?

name: Karagon
description: Survive and shoot killer robots then reuse their parts to construct your own rideable robots! Build a base, gather resources, craft weapons! Shoot, construct, and ride the most massive robots in this post apocalyptic open world survival crafting game! Experience cutting edge UE5 Lumen technology!

name: Mr.Treemp
description: Collect gold coins, climb higher and higher, seek the love of voters; everything is like in life! A small polititian began his journey to great wealth and success. But will he stuff his pockets with gold and achieve his aim? It depends only on your agility and persistence...

name: Tails From Alteria
description: Tails From Alteria is a wacky RPG that follows the misadventures of twin foxes Jeeve and Jayla Javari, as they race against unseen forces and try to stop the world from ending.

name: Spear Girl
description: Spear Girl is a puzzle-adventure platformer where you use your special spear to explore a kingdom where adherents have subjugated the king and imprisoned him, taking the crown. Climb mountains, pass through cursed forests and dark caves to unravel the mysteries behind the power of the spear.

name: Bit Sword
description: A 1-bit retro platformer ready for action

name: Battle Snakes
description: Battle Snakes is a 2-4 player local multiplayer arcade game where you compete with your friends in different arenas to be the last snake standing.

name: Cupcake Remember
description: Cupcake Remember is a fun, challenging and cute game. Where you need to help a baker deliver your cupcakes. In a mix of memory game and puzzle, you will have to push the limits of your memory.

name: Deviation from Way
description: You are a program, an Android of the RA model, which is being tested in an unknown laboratory. You will be presented with a test to check the functionality of this model. Your fate and the fate of others depends on how you pass this test.

name: Find Exit
description: This is not what you are looking for. Who knows, he remembers.

name: Lost in the Storm
description: Lost in the Storm is a single-player first-person mystery game with a little bit of puzzle-solving and action in between. The game is set in Andrew's deep subconscious using "The Light", a lantern God has given him to defend himself against the darkness and guide him to wake up from his coma.

name: THICC: The Himalayan Ice Climbing Challenge
description: THICC: The Himalayan Ice Climbing Challenge is a 2-4 player online party game. Climb, Swing, Grab your way to claim victory over your friends in the THICC cup.

name: That Castle
description: A huge castle arose in the north devastating everything around it, the kingdoms are afraid, making agreements and political movements. A reward was made to the brave, can you find the culprit and put an end to it?

name: Angry Rocketeer Frenzy
description: Angry rockeeteer frenzy - Are cursed robots trying to take over Earth? Not on my shift! Take your trusty rocket launcher into service and destroy all the enemies of our planet in this unusual mix of shoot 'em up and roguelite genres!

name: Edwardo
description: Edwardo is a stealth first-person horror game where you must search and collect samples using a UV-light. Beware! Edwardo is not happy that you have infiltrated his hideout and is armed with a Tommy gun.

name: The Night You'd Wish to Forget
description: One night, an alarm goes off in the old mansion of one of the richest families in the world. You, an employee of a security agency, go to find out the reason for this, but you quickly realize that everything is not as simple as it seemed at first.

name: Mortis Chronicles: Tale of Cowardice
description: A 2D turn-based RPG set in a mythical world where humans and demons collide! Conjure powerful spells, master unique skill trees, and strategically dictate the fate of each fight.

name: Island Crusaders
description: Island Crusaders is a cute yet brutal tactical RTS game. Defend your home against swarms of enemies as your picturesque island gets stained by the blood of your enemies. Unlock new and unique units, strategically place and move them, and defeat the impending army.

name: Super SpaceMail
description: Super SpaceMail is an Adventure game about connections where you play as a mailman delivering letters in space, making friends, and solving a mystery way bigger than this universe.

name: Turn the Line!
description: Turn the Line is a co-op tycoon game on the PC Steam platform where 1-4 players complete a dessert. Cute characters and simple controls, but difficult difficulty! Anyone can get started, but not everyone can do it perfectly! Challenge perfection for the rabbit's leaving work on time!

name: Piano Rocker
description: Piano Rocker is a rhythm game designed with MIDI Controllers and e-pianos in mind. Jam along your favourite songs or test your keyboard skills in a variety of mini-games built around keyboard fundamentals.

name: Freedom Flight
description: Freedom Flight is a relaxing but also intense game, where you fly through beautiful procedurally generated worlds and collect energy rings. You need to collect enough rings to get to the next world. It's a great game to relax for half an hour, chase the latest highscore and unlock new territories!

name: World Tree
description: A non-violent puzzle adventure where world peace has been achieved on Earth and it is up to you to discover the secrets of humanity and initiate open contact with the friendly races of the cosmic spheres.

name: Bobby
description: You can't trust anything in this game! Every step you take, you risk losing your head, failing, being burned, eaten, trampled, broken morally and physically. But don't worry — you won't know it until you take this step!

name: Owata's Action Online
description: 『OWATA'S ACTION ONLINE』 is an online multiplayer 2D action FPS with super difficult. With the help of other players, you may be able to clear the difficult stages that are too painful to clear by yourself.

name: Boom Company
description: BOOM COMPANY is a top-down, twin stick space-shooter with roguelite mechanics. Engage in frenetic combat. Complete missions for maximum profit. Upgrade vessels and weaponry with tech from rival factions.

name: Valkyrie Spirits
description: Valkyrie Arena is a minimalist turn-based tactics game about epic warrior spirits from different space-times. Create the best party combinations, adapt to the situations and use the best strategies to surpass each battle in the Valkyrie Arena!

name: Heaven's Hospital
description: This game is a horror game set in a hospital. Cute gods of death live in the hospital where they were hospitalized. From midnight to 6 am, the gods of death come to reap the lives of the patients. Survive by making full use of special abilities and various items.

name: RFVR
description: A medieval fantasy VR RPG set in a massive open world with deep player progression, fast-paced physics-based combat, and classic RPG game mechanics reimagined for VR. Full dive into the world of Random Fighter VR, there's something here for everyone.

name: Sumo Stuntmen 7
description: 7 stuntmen work on action movie with helicopters, monster trucks and SUVs. Will they survive till the end?

name: Te Encontré
description: You are a 13-year-old girl who has gotten into a sinister summoning game and now you will have to do everything possible to complete the game before Darla finds you, avoid at the cost of being seen or heard by Darla using the hiding places in the house while Complete the puzzle to finish the game.

name: House of Maids
description: Play as a young photographer, who travels around a tropical island and discovers a private mansion inhabited by hot beauties. Romance sexy girls, dive into lustful kinky fantasies, and unlock multiple endings to your adventures!

name: In the Line of My Heart
description: Akira is a 20 year old girl who works online, she had a date in an area of her city with a girl she met on the Internet, as they had known each other for about 3 years, the girl told her that one of those days they would have to meet, and that day comes as a date of "friends", until now.

name: Machine Ruin Self-Destruction Masturbation Life of the Sky Temple
description: Build your own Machines for masturbation!

name: Find the Sunbed
description: Do you also sometimes want to do something crazy? Get carried away and start a challenging, epic and unique challenge? Discover the limits of your own nervous endurance? If so, this game is perfect for you.

name: Model Railway Easily 2
description: Model railway builder with true 3D graphics. Form and paint the terrain, build the tracks with easy action, and place all the highly detailed objects to create exciting model railway layouts! Start your trains by simply pushing them and enjoy this fully functional model railway simulator!

name: Five dreams
description: You can have an adventure into the ancient temple, or raft on the mysterious seas, and meet up with giant unknown creatures... We provide five VR dreams in which players are free to explore the most fantastic scenes, along with the totally immersive experience.

name: Cruise Ship Handling
description: Cruise ship handling, maneuvering and mooring simulator. Feel like the captain of a large cruise liners.

name: Painter's Pets
description: Compete with your friends to claim as much territory as you can in this multiplayer sidescrolling arena game! Paint the town Red, Blue, Green or any combination of the three!

name: Second to Nun
description: Second to Nun is a top-down budget-friendly pixel-art retro top-down fighting classic game. Beat your way to the top and become the top nun through the gruelling challenges on the Island of Trials and Tribulations!

name: Poop Plague in Fairyland
description: Enjoy a cool mixture of an FPS and simple strategy elements! Scout areas as a ghost to plan your attack. Guide units and remove poop crystals with your mining units. Use crystal shards to attack, lure enemies and use it to gain tactical advantage. Play forever improving on two leader boards!

name: Ever Fallen Empire
description: A Strategic Empire Collapser. As The Authority. Manage a living galaxy, and plan large-scale actions according to your needs. Collapse governments, inflame rebellions, seed new factions, and sacrifice your own. All for purposes grander than any Empire could hold.

name: Medieval Remembrance
description: Fight for Christendom and defeat the Romuva pagans of Old Prussia and their Necromantic ways.

name: Karma Crown
description: Karma Crown is a post-apocalyptic rogue-like 2d top-down shooter game focused on players' strategic choice and movement control.

name: SnowRocket
description: Snowmobile race across different terrain. Avoid various obstacles. Learn to enter corners and race for the best result with other players. It won't be easy but you may be the best SnowRocket rider!

name: Edgar's Room
description: Edgar's Room is a first person horror game. Find yourself in unique situations, solve puzzles and listen for any signs of Edgar's presence. You must find a way out of this house before it is too late. Don't get caught, pray you make it out alive!

name: Spirit Wolves
description: A gorgeous, 3rd-Person adventure game about a lone spirit wolf cub discovering memories of the past. Take control of a spirit wolf as you discover the memories of each unknown spirit realm.

name: President Rocket Game
description: Help ex-president Lloyd The Prez Kinski - an arch conservative hypocrite and chauvinist - get a seat on board of the maiden flight of german tech mogul Daniel Brunners new rocket. What the hell could go wrong?

name: Weird Cinema
description: If you were put in a horror movie, would you survive? Play multiple roles in various classic horror films. Try to survive in horror films by decrypting and fighting

name: Duck and the Land of Flightless Birds
description: Duck and the Land of Flightless Birds - A charming platforming adventure where you play as a fat duck that can't fly.

name: Blood of Utpia
description: This is a visual novel game, an interactive text-based adventure with some elements of dating simulation. this game contains themes of violence, gore and immorality. The themes of this game does not represent the views and opinions of the author.

name: Bomb Pong
description: An arcade action-packed strategy game. Move the 'Pong Ball through perilous waves of Paddles, Balls and BOMBS! Don't explode and don't get hit! With three modes in BOMB Pong, you'll always be occupied.

name: Robotics in VR
description: Gamified solution, curriculum and content for teaching robotics in VR.

name: Kill King
description: Participate in a one-on-one battle with other players or fight against AI and complete the first chapter of the campaign. Give orders to your army and watch them fight. Kill King is a fresh look at the world's most popular game - chess. Enjoy the turn-based strategy battle with RPG elements.

name: Hero Lilith
description: "Hero Lilith" is an open world fantasy action role-playing game.Freely choose weapons.Paper doll system.Randomly generated dungeons.Easy and humorous plot.

name: Stop the Cult
description: You are responsible for the supply chain of a group of adventurers in a Lovecraftian 1920 themed setting. Lead the team from behind the curtain against incogitable horrors, crafting powerful poisons, and making sure their coffers are always full, and their weapons are always ready.

name: Nahka
description: NAHKA is a horror game from the viewpoint of a dog.

name: Hungry Wolf
description: This is very interesting and very cool horror game Hungry Wolf. Where to fend off a dire hungry wolf with a slingshot. You only need to hold out for 3 minutes for winning game. Good luck player and good game.

name: Monster Among Us
description: 《人中怪物》是由九头龙工作室独立研发的一款恐怖策略解谜类游戏。迷途的你误入一段阴谋满满的事件，跌落不同的时空，探索所遇之人的纷纷纠葛。他们的故事等待真相，而你便是揭露真相的那一人。

name: Spaceships
description: Spaceships is an action arcade game. Fight epic battles, explore the galaxy and discover its secrets. But watch out, Kate is hunting you...

name: Singularity Dungeon
description: Immerse yourself in an amazing adventure and choose your destiny in this Action Rpg, Pixel Art game. Check how much you can handle in endless dungeons.

name: Unveiled
description: Unveiled is a visual novel game with a unique twist of having a turn based strategy added in it. The story is taken from the super popular Isekai genre from Japan, about a boy who died and reincarnated in a fantasy world.

name: Elfin Clay
description: Mysterious and friendly online game "Elfin Clay" "Elfin Clay" is a collaborative battle game in which thieves made of magic clay collect a lot of treasures.

name: Bunce
description: This game will make your nerve cells cry (maybe).

name: Tomorrow's Past
description: Explore a city lost in time. Run extensive black market businesses with your friends! Battle other groups of people for control over the city and its resources. Become the Mob Boss you've always wanted to be!

name: Toy Kingdom 3
description: An arena-styled FPS in which you acquire toys and fight beside them. Play as an action figure - you are a toy. Toy Kingdom is in peril—Sir Cuddles has taken reign of the room and all the toys in it. Fight in the arena, build your toy team, and defeat Sir Cuddles.

name: Batsu Maru
description: BATSUMARU is a short and minimalist puzzle game.

name: Block Heist
description: A game that won't let you get bored. Meet the unique action game Block Heist. Plan and commit the most daring robberies.

name: Golden Underfoot
description: An entertaining novel about the search for treasures and survival in the wastelands.

name: Maze Mayhem
description: Welcome to the mazes of mayhem. A current work in progress that in now ready for public input. The goal of the game is as simple as simple can be. Traverse your way through maze like levels and collect the star at the end. Do you have what it takes to make it to the end?

name: Plague Lords
description: The investigation of multiple disappearances in the midst of the Black Death turns into a bloody stand against a new mysterious threat. Survive in a turn-based, tactical sandbox, managing a settlement and dozens of peasants, craftsmen and warriors to stop the upcoming Scourge.

name: Warpflux
description: Warpflux is a top-down action based resource management game. As the commander of Earth's colony ship and a fleet of autonomous drones, collect supplies and defend against hostile forces during a thousand year voyage to save humanity.

name: Sailing Stone
description: Sailing Stone is a 3D roller arcade indie game.Pass through 50 levels as fast as you can and try become number one on the leaderboard.

name: Colortone: Remixed
description: There is only your mind and riddles on the way to your freedom. Riddles have become even more, they have become more complex, but let them become longer towards freedom.

name: Generations of Destruction
description: Generations of Destruction is a simple rougelite horizontal shoot’em up with short play sessions. Get more powerful as you play through each randomly generated level. A prefect game for when you only have a few minutes to play.

name: Escape From Docy
description: Escape from Docy – it’s an indie game, where you have to escape from Docy, he is your enemy who is doing everything to prevent you from reaching the end or finish the game.

name: Neon Dragons
description: Try to survive various hordes of enemies while destroying as many ships and looting as many as possible in an ever-changing universe. Combine different active and passive items to form the best equipment combinations capable of defeating powerful bosses.

name: Angry Dad
description: Crazy Dad Simulator. Help Dad watch football and stop family madness!

name: Roman Wars: Deck Building Game
description: In "Roman Wars" we fused elements of deck building board game and strategy together. Build your deck, upgrade your cards, develop your base, and fight different enemies. Try various missions, use bonus cards, and don't forget about cats!

name: Wind of Life
description: The game is about the wind and its freedom. Make your way to a colorful and meditative journey. Go all the path escaping the dangers of an abandoned planet and controlling the wind power.

name: The Witchmade Shop
description: The Witchmade Shop is a witch shop simulator in a provincial town. Listen to the stories of visitors, take orders, brew potions (trying not to poison the one who will use it), earn money, buy ingredients, and everything in a circle.

name: Totally Normal Boyfriend
description: Totally Normal Boyfriend is a visual novel/dating simulator about your loving and caring boyfriend that would do anything for you.

name: Scufflers
description: Knock opponents as far off-screen as possible. A platform-fighter with extremely simply controls. Game is played in rounds, where everything resets when someone is knocked off the screen, until someone is the last character standing.

name: Timmy the Tiger's Big Adventure
description: This is a small game designed to be a cute, fun, and casual experience for gamers of all ages. It was made in RPGMaker XP so the controls are simple and easy to use. Take control of a tiger and guide him to his new home, after a mysterious disaster threatens to destroy everything he knows.

name: Bizarre Mutation World
description: A science fiction turn-based logic game. Klorofit needs to solve the puzzles to save his pet from genetic mutation.

name: Deformity
description: Deformity is a turn-based fantasy strategy about a world dominated by sins.

name: Virulence
description: Virulence is a 2D top down metroidvania / Zelda-like action RPG, where the player will explore the human body as a virus species and infect other cells in order to survive. The player can control an individual virus or command a whole population.

name: Reflex
description: A casual puzzle game in which you add components to unknown enemy bases that will reflect, duplicate and split the Reflex missiles. Destroy the enemy power generators, communication systems and weapon platforms across more than 100 levels. Each new world brings with it new technology to utilise.

name: No One's Earth
description: Explore the abandoned CCTA through various simulations of alien environments, and improve your equipments to beat natural and synthetic challenges, looking for the ingredients that can resolve the Earth dispute, in this 2.5D science fiction adventure.

name: Expresso Espresso
description: Expresso Espresso is a coffee shop management game with a great focus on in-depth coffee creation and market simulation. Roast different coffee beans from across the world, create different drinks from a variety of syrups and styles, manage your team of baristas to create the best coffee drink!

name: Godshard Chronicles
description: Godshard Chronicles is a top-down action RPG based in the world of the Godshard novels with music by famed composer Noriyuki Iwadare. Inspired by titles such as The Legend of Zelda, Grandia, and the Mana series. Fight in action-packed battles, explore a sprawling world either solo or with a friend!

name: Sir, You Are Being Hunted: Reinvented Edition
description: Sir, You Are Being Hunted: Reinvented Edition presents a savagely funny world of procedurally-generated stealth and survival. Roam wild in spooky British landscapes, all the while being hunted by a menagerie of bloodthirsty robots. A beautifully remastered new edition of the cult survival game.

name: Devil's Eyes
description: Mike arrives at university and is ready to have a time of his life, but something is not quite right. Follow the story and unveil the mysteries behind the tragic events.

name: Mad Cart
description: Enjoy the ride in a fast-paced game! It is endless runner with puzzle elements! Rotate circle platforms, think, shoot and don't forget to enjoy stylized and colorful graphics!

name: Virago
description: The game is about a young girl called willow, after an incident with her stalker she begins to suffer from hallucinations.

name: I Have No Weapons
description: I Have No Weapons is a rogue-lite action indie game. It offers 36 interesting ways to kill enemies, by using enemy body parts as weapons...

name: True Bum Simulator
description: The game about the life story of a bum who is trying to realize an old dream and become the richest bum in this world. This is a True Bum Simulator where you can become anyone from a beggar who fights for life to an influential celebrity who has the whole world in her hands.

name: Animal Simulator
description: New unique open world survival game. Choose one of the animals and survive in the open world together with your group, or human friend. Each animal has its own style of play. You can choose a predator or a little rabbit. It’s up to you.

name: Srok Godnosti
description: Srok Godnosti is an atmospheric adventure game set in the post-USSR setting. In the role of a district police officer, you will have to serve in a small town lost in time. The fate and lives of city residents will depend on your actions.

name: The Grip of Madness
description: The Grip of Madness is a multiplayer cooperative FPS where your teammates can betray you at any time. Shoot your way through hordes of monsters, gather clues, and complete the ritual to stop their invasion.

name: Nitroverse
description: Nitroverse is a rogue-like hack & slay with level-based progression.

name: Salvationland
description: Deciding to find the "city of dreams", young traveller from the wasteland named Victor went to northern mountains by the old railway tracks. The desire to find his place in the cradle of surviving mankind turns into a struggle against an evil mayor and transformation into a hero-liberator...

name: Jeremia: Nightfall
description: Jeremiah: The Nightfall Our memories are what tell us who we are. But what if, suddenly, you had none? What if you had to emerge from the darkness on your own strength? Will you be ready to face your demons?

name: System Critical: The Race Against Time
description: Fun Run and Gun Platformer VR Shooter. Blast your arm cannon,use Grenades and melee weapons, Run, Jump, and Double Jump to dodge Projectiles and make your way through the carefully crafted levels. Discover secret areas and destroy objects while Navigating obstacles and defeat bosses to progress

name: Modern Game Tycoon
description: You are an aspiring game developer in 2000. Hire personal, expand offices, design the games of your dreams and try to make money from them. Reach as high as you can. From a small company to a huge corporation.

name: Soulless Legions
description: Breaking the limits of strategy games by hosting millions of ability combinations for each individual unit. Soulless Legions is a 1v1 multiplayer medieval fantasy 'Tug O' War' game that allows players a lifetime of customization and strategic inquiry.

name: Determina
description: Command great challengers in strategic online card battles, where there is absolutely no randomness: you control your fate.

name: Nero's Adventure
description: Nero's adventure is a 2D puzzle adventure physic game, where pollution has taken over the ocean, down to the darkest depths. Every creature in the sea is struggling to survive, but there is still hope. Nero, a mutant anglerfish, is able to survive with toxicity, will he be able to clean up the sea?

name: The Hungry One
description: A mysterious story about the consequences of loneliness and unfulfilled dreams. Help artificial intelligence in the form of a little girl and avoid facing a ruthless monster.

name: Hostile Planet: Survival
description: Hostile Planet: Survival is a harsh adventure on an uncharted planet that full of danger and trials.

name: The Walking Stick
description: A stylish old man who loves adrenaline enters a world where canes release power. Collect powerful canes and travel through the four biomes full of challenges and action in an endless fight to conquer this fantastic world.

name: Mina the Hollower
description:
Mina the Hollower is a bone-chilling action-adventure game featuring classic gameplay and an 8-bit aesthetic in the style of Game Boy Color, refined for the modern era.

Quick and deliberate 60fps action combat, captivating world design, and top-down adventuring combine in a nostalgic blend. Whip foes, burrow through the ground, and explore a pixel-perfect world in Mina the Hollower, a brand new game from the developers who brought you Shovel Knight!

name: Tiger Striker: MP080
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 080.
